verses.name: 1 Kings 7:28
verses.text: And the work of the bases was on this manner: they had borders, and the borders were between the ledges:

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:29
verses.text: And on the borders that were between the ledges were lions, oxen, and cherubims: and upon the ledges there was a base above: and beneath the lions and oxen were certain additions made of thin work.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:30
verses.text: And every base had four brasen wheels, and plates of brass: and the four corners thereof had undersetters: under the laver were undersetters molten, at the side of every addition.
